data.text:
Our Special Flight Sale is here so that you can start planning your perfect vacation! 
https://t.co/0tWnl0ZkPd https://t.co/GYlz2uzSgf
@99probzuaintone We apologize for the inconvenience; we are experiencing a high volume of calls and messages, if you still need some help please share with us your requiere. DD
@DiegoTejeida Hi, Diego. Please share with us your reservation code. MA*
@melissapalomo Melissa, please share with us through DM your reservation code and ticket number. we will gladly verify it. *HS

data.text: @Nessbb1 @Nessbb1. Wwe have a protection policy that you can validate through the following link:https://t.co/c7cfc17iYG, please share by DM your booking code and the options you want to take from the policy to proceed immediately. *AT

The destination of your dreams is waiting for you, when you're ready. Check our travel flexibility waivers to change your itinerary for your peace of mind.
https://t.co/33oEF7IpJ1 https://t.co/cUQRgjQOGS

@DiegoJordiUlloa Jordi, in this case your flighs have been cancelled, according to our policy we can leave the ticket open until January 10th . Here you can find the information about our policy https://t.co/c7cfc17iYG. *HS
@jillrgarvey @jillrgarvey, unfortunately the cancellations in this period are for reasons not attributable to the airline, therefore it is not possible to proceed with a refunds you mention. ST

@isosa84 @isosa84, Agradecemos tu contacto y lamentamos la percepción que tienes de nuestro servicio,  estamos recibiendo una cantidad inusual de mensajes y trabajamos a nuestra máxima capacidad, indícanos si hay algo en lo que podamos ayudarte. *AT
@JorgeAl07054524 Hola Alejandro, por favor compártenos tu clave de reservación de 6 letras en un DM. Quedamos atentos. *BQ
@DiegoJordiUlloa Jordi, What is your reservation code? we will verify your situation. *HS
@hijoleitsramon Hi, Ramon! Be kind to share your ticket number and the email linked to your booking reference. ¨*AR
@Asuhoff02 Hello, please share with us your reservation code. we wil gladly verify it. *HS
@MatthewFelix_ Matthew, please share with us your reservation code. We will gladly verify it. *HS
@fifiris_naiz Monica, we see that the receipt was sent to you already on March 27th at 11:36 am. If you did not receive the email please check you spam box. *HS
@megmilll We greatly appreciate your patience and understanding, as all our lines are saturated by the number of passengers in the same situation. We're here to serve you. IF

data.text: We know that there are times when you need to travel. If this is your case, we are ready to fly and have implemented strict sanitation measures to ensure your well-being. https://t.co/QdFudOYbS8

@putaface Hi. We offer you a sincere apology for the waiting time, we are receiving an unusual amount of messages . If you have a booking share it in a private message, We share the following link where you can validate the applicable rules for changes https://t.co/aHfsdaC5Gn *AT
@BG_Shevchenko Hi! Let us review it. Please send via DM your booking reference or ticket number. *ÄR
@juno_jablon Juno, please share with us your reservation code. Additional here you can find the link with our policy available https://t.co/c7cfc17iYG. *HS
@KristyQ Hi Kristy, please share with us your confirmation code of 6 letters in a DM. *BQ
@toricast098 Angie, Please be so kind to share with us your booking code by DM. We will be pleased to assist you. ST
@bobbywojcik Bobby, please share your reservation key, we will verify it. IF

@micah21us We offer you an apology for the waiting time, we are receiving an unusual amount of messages. If you have a booking share it in a private message to indicate the available options. We share the following link with the applicable rules for changes https://t.co/aHfsdaC5Gn *AT

@elizabethhmtz Hi. We offer you a sincere apology for the waiting time,. If you have a bookin g share it in a private message to indicate the available options ; We share the following link where you can validate the applicable rules for changes https://t.co/aHfsdaC5Gn *AT
@britneysneers Please share the reservation key with us, we will verify it. IF

data.text:
Our first cargo flight landed in Frankfurt today, transporting medical equipment that is crucial in the fight against COVID-19 in Germany, and contributing to the economy and business.
We are thankful to @Airport_FRA for their professionalism and support. https://t.co/3M7nHyUpQC
@MohammadRSharaf Mohammad, please share with us your ticket number, we will gladly assist you with the cancellation. *HS
@MimaBrown Jemima, please share with us your reservation code. we will gladly verify it. *HS

@_anaxk We are receiving an unusual number of calls due to the situation, we are working to serve our passengers who are in situations similar to yours in the fastest and most efficient way. We hope you can understand us and we appreciate your understanding. * HS

The current situation has meant that we have had to change our operations. That being said, we're ready to take you to your destination when you are. 
All the relevant information is updated regularly and is available on the following page: https://t.co/33oEF7IpJ1 https://t.co/c1O7ogm1nn

data.text:
You are at the center of all our decisions. 
If your flight has been canceled or you wish to make a change due to the COVID-19 outbreak, your ticket can be converted to an electronic voucher which is valid for a year. 
Learn more here: https://t.co/33oEF800Az
@srnyoung Nate, we understand your concern, however, we ask for your kind support to insist at 1 800 237 6639 and one of our executives will gladly assist you. We are working as fas as we can. *AH
@jdogg_martin We apologize for the inconvenience; we are experiencing a high volume of calls and messages, if you still need some help please share with us your reservation code.
RT @AeromexicoUSA: Taking your suggestions, we have decided to add an additional adjustment for flights purchased before March 18, 2020, fl…
@JamiletteMar Hola Jamilete, por favor compártenos en un DM tu clave de reservación. Quedamos atentos. *BQ

@iitxelita Hola, te compartimos que Aeromexico ha emitido una política en la que se establecieron límites con respecto a los cambios de tarifa. En el siguiente enlace podrás revisarlo: https://t.co/ytPZ4tKYDK. 1/2
@rial_alberto Roberto, hemos verificado que nos hiciste llegar un mensaje directo. Continuaremos la atención por ese canal. *MO
@karannbe Please tell us what inconvenience you had with our service, your opinion is very important for us. IF

data.text:
We are committed to serving you
If you were not able to contact us before your flight date, your ticket is still valid and you will not be charged any “no show” fees.
As soon as you are able to contact us, we will give you more information on the options eligible for your flight.

Taking your suggestions, we have decided to add an additional adjustment for flights purchased before March 18, 2020, flying between March 18-31, 2020.
Learn more: https://t.co/33oEF7IpJ1 https://t.co/F9AOb2x6t0
@KimberlyAlexis Hi Kimberly, please contact us in a DM with yor confirmation code. *BQ

@KimberlyAlexis Hello, in this case please contact us at 800 237 6639. It is important to mention that we are receiving an unusual number of messages and calls we hope you can understand that we are working hard to assist as soon as possible. *HS
@AviationLawJeff Hi, at the moment we do not have information of affectation. *BQ
@Patrick83745205 Patrick83745205, We have already request your booking code by your DM. ST
@cloudraven Eduardo, por favor coméntanos si has realizado tu reembolso. En caso contrario, te pedimos nos compartas tu clave de reserva a través de DM. Quedamos a tus órdenes. ST
@MemKidDelux AnnaKatherine, please by DM share with us your booking code (6 letters) we will verify it. ST
@DanielleCady1 @DanielleCady1 Danielle, please by DM share with us your booking code (6 letters). ST
@SheriaRobinson Sheria, we appreciate your understanding about this contingency. Please be so kind to share your booking code (6 letters) and tell us How can we assist you? ST

@Scott_EllisTM We are sorry for the situation, we are receiving a significant flow of calls from passengers who are in the same situation as you, so the waiting time is long. We appreciate your patience and understanding. * HS

@un_amour0309 We are sorry for the situation, we are receiving a significant flow of calls from passengers who are in the same situation as you, so the waiting time is long. We appreciate your patience and understanding. * HS

data.text: In light of the global coronavirus outbreak, we are committed to your safety. We want to share the measures we are implementing on our aircraft to ensure the safety of you and all our passengers. https://t.co/T7Bca89nus
If you are not flying within the next 72 hours, please do not call us at this time. Our call center is currently working at full capacity. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
If you are flying within the next 72 hours, we are working to prioritize your call. Please consult our travel flexibility waivers: https://t.co/33oEF800Az

data.text:
We fly higher when we lift each other up. 
On a normal day, our flight crew is a prime example of equality and inclusion, and today we are proud to be commemorating #InternationalWomensDay with a flight lead by our crew’s finest. 
#8M https://t.co/nG1VG0N203

data.text: Valle de Guadalupe is Mexican wine county, making it the perfect destination for spring break. https://t.co/Rdt4oKnYCx
This little piece of paradise is truly heaven on earth. https://t.co/Irp7nRrsqx
The Feria de San Marcos is around the corner– you can't miss this unique fair! https://t.co/7IYt5VeEE2

We are proud to have Elizabeth Abadie, our first female Captain who recently retired, as part of our #MexicanosConAlas. Her story is proof that if you are passionate, there is no obstacle big enough to keep your from your dreams. https://t.co/o8W7fJQ96O
